Articles.Content: so heres the story: i landed bill of the originally 3 on minmus, he was the first person i had to do it. there was to little fuel to send him home, so i made a rescue rocket to come and get him. i landed there, and was about to retract the ladder i had that helped the kerbanuts down to the surface... i then accidently decoupled instead of retracting.... so i now have 3 kerbanauts stuck on minmus!!! pic in attachment...

so heres the story: i landed bill of the originally 3 on minmus, he was the first person i had to do it. there was to little fuel to send him home, so i made a rescue rocket to come and get him. i landed there, and was about to retract the ladder i had that helped the kerbanuts down to the surface... i then accidently decoupled instead of retracting.... so i now have 3 kerbanauts stuck on minmus!!! pic in attachment...

Get the crewtank mod and get them in the tank. Simple

Get the crewtank mod and get them in the tank. Simple

crewtank mod?? sorry, but i havent checked out any of the mods recently, been doing everything vanilla up untill yesterday.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/9243-v0-16-Damned-Aerospace-Version-1-5-2-Crewtank

Here you go, it's a mod that adds a crew tank so you can hold more kerbals. I am using it since yesterday and I like it

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/9243-v0-16-Damned-Aerospace-Version-1-5-2-Crewtank

Here you go, it's a mod that adds a crew tank so you can hold more kerbals. I am using it since yesterday and I like it

ha, thanks for that man. ive only ever landed a large pod on minmus once... and a small pod once(legit, i used cheats one time(ctrl+alt+shif+d)) so i think i will re-design the lander once moar!!!!
